function.description: Calculate the greatest common divisor of two integers using the Euclidean algorithm.
function.name: find_gcd

function.description: Calculate the greatest common divisor of two integers.
function.name: gcd

function.description: Calculate the remainder of a number when divided by a modulus.
function.name: calculate_remainder

modulus.description: The modulus to divide by (must be positive integer).

function.description: Convert a decimal number to a specified base and return it as a string.
function.name: decimal_to_base

base.description: The base to convert to (e.g., 2 for binary, 4 for base four).

number.description: The decimal number to be converted.

function.description: Calculate the result of modulo operation for a given number and modulus.
function.name: modular_arithmetic

modulus.description: The modulus to divide by (must be positive integer).

function.description: Calculate the result of modulo operation for a given number and modulus as well as their gcd.
function.name: gcd_modular_arithmetic

function.description: Convert any decimal number to a specified base and return the result as a string representation.
function.name: convert_decimal_to_base_general

base.description: The base to convert to (minimum base is 2).

number.description: The decimal number to be converted.

function.description: Calculate the remainder of a number when divided by a modulus.
function.name: calculate_modulo

function.description: Convert a given decimal number to a specified base and return the result as a string representation.
function.name: convert_decimal_to_base

base.description: The base to convert to (minimum base is 2).

number.description: The decimal number to be converted.
